fullDescription.intro: Used in regression tests to test if two files are equal. The node will compare the two selected files and fails with an exception if the files are different. In this case the node will throw an exception, i.e., it will not transition into the Executed but the Failed state.
fullDescription.option: File chooser to select the file to be compared to the reference file.
File chooser to select the reference file.

dynInPort.name: File system connection (file to be compared)

ports.dynInPort: The file system connection storing the file to compare.
The file system connection storing the reference file.
